cleaned_text: A cup of cleansing for your day Are you craving for some extra kick for your life? Start your day healthy with some detox tea. This herbal tea supports weight loss and improves the cleansing of metabolic waste. Detox tea is completely caffeine-free so you can enjoy it whenever you want. This delicious herbal tea contains rooibos, lemon herb, fennel, and some ginger. These wonderful herbs together make an excellent combination that is not only healthy but tasty as well. Dive into this cleansing and enchanting tea experience and never look back. Green rooibos 65 %, lemon herb10 %, fennel 10 %, ginger4 %, liquorice root 3 %, nettle 3 % camomile 3 %, natural aroma. Payment Methods Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.
